name: Association Belge des Consommateurs Test-Achats / Belgische Verbruikersunie Test-Aankoop
goal: As a consumer organisation our goal is to inform, help and defend consumers in all their 'consumer activities'. We do this by providing them all information they need, by helping them in conflicts with businesses and service providers, by launching legal (class) actions, by representing them in advisory boards and commissions,  and by lobbying decision makers at all levels (regional, national, European, â€¦)
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market, Sustainability, Premature Obsolescence, Enforcement, Telecom, Energy, Data protection, Internet of Things, Financial services, Food (labeling, novel foods, nutrition, additives), Health (Access to medicines, medical devices, transparency clinical surveys, E-health), Consumer rights,
Circular economy, International trade, REFIT consumer acquis, competition,...
